**Globalstar Satellite Services Tender**
========================================

### General Information

* **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00028071
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM022417/28071
* **Publication Date**: October 29, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **End User**: Shared Services Canada

### Service Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites proposals for the provision of Globalstar satellite services on an as-needed basis. This solicitation aims to satisfy the requirement for a three (3) year contract, plus three (3) additional one (1) year options.

The scope of work includes the provision of Globalstar satellite services to SSC, which will be used for various purposes. Bidders are expected to provide a detailed proposal outlining their capabilities, experience, and pricing.

### Contract Terms

* **Contract Term**: Three (3) years, plus three (3) additional one (1) year options
* **Service Type**: As and when required

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada and the United States

### How to Participate

To participate in this tender, bidders must:

1. Register in the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit a response, and receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations.
2. Review the tender documents and statement of work to ensure compliance with the requirements.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Nathalie Houle at 613-301-5101 or [contact information removed].
